type.name: spell
type.learnspell: this.parent = spells_known this.inventoryverbs = Split ("Cast", " ") P (DynamicTemplate("SpellLearn", this)) UpdateSpells

type.name: attackspell
banishingspell
scroll
type.use: CancelSpell do (this, "describecast") game.pov.currentattack = this SneakUpdate (4) do(this, "spelleffect") this.parent = dead

type.name: potion
type.drink: CancelSpell () msg ("You drink the " + GetDisplayAlias(this)) this.parent = dead do(this, "startmagiceffect")

type.name: healingpotion
type.drink: msg ("You drink the healing potion, and suddenly you feel fine.") game.pov.hitpoints = CalcFullHits () this.parent = dead

type.name: magic_item
magic_bonus_item
type.onafterwear: //msg(this.affects) n = GetInt(game.pov, this.affects) set(game.pov, this.affects, n + this.level) UpdateArmour UpdateStatus
type.onafterremove: n = GetInt(game.pov, this.affects) set(game.pov, this.affects, n - this.level) UpdateArmour UpdateStatus

type.name: magicaleffectprovider
magicalattackprovider
